title: Crime and Drama Music Pack 2
description: This is a music pack featuring nineteen unique ambient/orchestral/horror instrumental tracks. Utilizing orchestral and ambient effects, all of these pieces are versatile enough to use across a wide variety of projects.
longDescription:
Music composer, Living Force is proud to present the Crime and Drama Music Pack 2! This is an asset pack that contains nineteen orchestral instrumentals geared towards the world of crime, drama, and horror. The pieces all contain a fade-out and are loopable for desired cut scenes, action sequences, and transitions for your projects.

Â 

The following instrumentals are included with this asset pack:

Behind You D Minor 1:02

Beyond The Reeds C Minor 1:16

Chase G Minor 1:21

Discovery D Minor 1:18

Evidence D Minor 1:06

Frighten C Minor 1:02

Lone Survivor D Minor 1:54

On The Run Bb Minor 1:08

Prospect Road D Minor 2:01

Returning To The Crime Scene C Minor 1:12

Somewhere On The Ship Hiding C Minor 1:31

The Cellar Is Open D Minor 1:24

The City G Minor 1:29

The Green Sands C Minor 1:33

The Lost Temple of Magic A Minor 1:30

The Trench F Minor 1:45

The True Crypt F Minor 1:24

The Twilight Hour F Minor 1:12

Would You Like To Play A Game E Minor 1:03
